General.Name: Metalúrgica Riosulense S.A
General.Description: Metalúrgica Riosulense S.A. engages in the manufacture and sale of high-precision parts and accessories for automotive and related vehicles in Brazil. It offers camshafts; valve tappets; rockers arms; pistons; cylinder liners; piston rings; crankshaft rings; valve guides; valve seats; engine valves; valve springs; injector sleeves; combustion- pre chamber; and reamers. It offers its products for applications in light vehicles, utility vehicles, motorcycles, and agricultural machinery and rail. The company exports its products to 25 countries in Latin America, North America, Asia, Europe, and Oceania. Metalúrgica Riosulense S.A. was founded in 1946 and is based in Rio do Sul, Brazil. Metalúrgica Riosulense S.A. is a subsidiary of Stramosk Participações S.A.
General.Address: Rua EmIlio Adami, 700, Rio Do Sul, SC, Brazil, 89164-910
